revised_title: John Walter Ride: A Pioneering Physicist and Engineer
tldr: John Walter Ride was a brilliant physicist and engineer who made significant contributions to various fields, including lighting technology, optics, and electrical engineering. He worked on developing new types of lamps, such as the 'Osglim Lamp' and high-pressure mercury vapour lamps, which greatly improved lighting efficiency and color range. Ride's work had a significant impact on modern lighting technology and his influence can still be seen in today's lighting systems.
